remarks: A cover is finer iff it has a subcover which is both finer and a refinement.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
statement:
fnessref.1 $e |- X = U. A $.
fnessref.2 $e |- Y = U. B $.
fnessref $p |- ( X = Y -> ( A Fne B <-> E. c ( c C_ B /\ ( A Fne c /\ c Ref A ) ) ) ) $.
$d A c $.
$d B c $.
$d X c $.
$d Y c $.
